description: This file defines a research team setup using custom classes like Agent, Team, and AGUIApp, and initializes an application for a research team with specific roles and configurations.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent with specific roles, models, and instructions.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team composed of multiple agents with shared instructions and configurations.

classes.name: AGUIApp
classes.description: Represents an application that integrates a team with a user interface.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Returns the application instance configured for the AGUI interface.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the server to run the AGUI application on a specified port with optional reload.
